mainBoard.name: Ancestral Blade
mainBoard.originalText:
When Ancestral Blade enters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then attach Ancestral Blade to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: If the triggered ability causes two Soldiers to be created (due to an effect such as that of Doubling Season), Ancestral Blade becomes attached to one of them.
No player may take any actions between the time you create the Soldier token and the time Ancestral Blade becomes attached to it.

The Soldier token that you create enters the battlefield as a 1/1 creature. Any abilities that trigger when a creature with a certain power enters the battlefield will see the token enter as a 1/1 creature. Static abilities that affect the Soldier's power and toughness may change this, but Ancestral Blade will be attached to the Soldier before the game checks to see if it has toughness 0 or less. For example, if Illness in the Ranks ("Creature tokens get -1/-1") is on the battlefield, the Soldier will enter as a 0/0 creature, but then Ancestral Blade will make it a 1/1 and the token will survive.

rulings.text: If the Rebel is destroyed, the Equipment stays on the battlefield. Similarly, you may pay its equip cost to move it from the Rebel token to another creature you control.

The Rebel enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature, then the Equipment becomes attached to it. Abilities that trigger when a creature enters the battlefield see that a 2/2 creature entered the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Starnheim Courser
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Artifact and enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

rulings.text: The cost reduction applies only to generic mana in the costs of artifact and enchantment spells you cast. It can't reduce requirements of specific colors of mana.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you're paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Starnheim Courser). The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.

foreignData.name: Shikari lancesoleil
foreignData.text: Tant que la Shikari lancesoleil est équipée, elle a l'initiative et le lien de vie. (Elle inflige des blessures de combat avant les créatures sans l'initiative. Les blessures infligées par cette créature vous font aussi gagner autant de points de vie.)

foreignData.flavorText: L'improvvisa scomparsa di Raksha divise i leonid in due gruppi. La lotta per la sopravvivenza li ricongiunse.
foreignData.name: Shikari della Lancia Solare
foreignData.text: Fintanto che la Shikari della Lancia Solare è equipaggiata, ha attacco improvviso e legame vitale. (Infligge danno da combattimento prima delle creature senza attacco improvviso. Il danno da essa inflitto ti fa anche guadagnare altrettanti punti vita.)

foreignData.flavorText: ラクシャを失い、レオニンは二つの群れへと分かれた。生き残りをかけた戦いが、群れを再び統一させた。
foreignData.name: 太陽の槍のシカール
foreignData.text: 太陽の槍のシカールに装備品がついているかぎり、これは先制攻撃と絆魂を持つ。（これは先制攻撃を持たないクリーチャーよりも先に戦闘ダメージを与える。これがダメージを与えると、さらにあなたはその点数分のライフを得る。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 猫・兵士

mainBoard.name: Sunspear Shikari
mainBoard.originalText: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. Damage dealt by it also causes you to gain that much life.)

rulings.text: If all Equipment attached to Sunspear Shikari somehow becomes unequipped after it deals combat damage in the first combat damage step, it won't assign combat damage in the second combat damage step.

mainBoard.text: As long as this creature is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. Damage dealt by it also causes you to gain that much life.)

foreignData.name: Walkürenschwert
Espada de la valkiria
foreignData.text:
Cuando la Espada de la valkiria entre, puedes pagar {4}{W}. Si lo haces, crea una ficha de criatura Guerrero Ángel blanca 4/4 con las habilidades de volar y vigilancia y luego anéxale la Espada de la valkiria.
La criatura equipada obtiene +2/+1.
Equipar {3}.

foreignData.name: Épée de valkyrie
Spada della Valchiria
戦乙女の剣
foreignData.type: アーティファクト — 装備品

mainBoard.name: Valkyrie's Sword

rulings.text: The Angel Warrior creature token enters the battlefield as a 4/4 creature. Any abilities that trigger when a creature with a certain power or toughness enters the battlefield will see the token enter as a 4/4 creature.

You decide whether to pay {4}{W} as the enters-the-battlefield ability resolves. If you do, you immediately create the Angel Warrior creature token and attach Valkyrie's Sword to it. No players may respond to your decision to pay or not, and no player may take actions during this process.

mainBoard.flavorText: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Blüte der Wildblumen richtet sich hier nicht nach den Jahreszeiten, sondern nach den Gezeiten der Magie.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Heide
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Heide kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie sie ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Weiß.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Las flores salvajes de aquí no florecen según las estaciones, sino según los altibajos y el flujo de la magia.
foreignData.name: Brezal floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Brezal floreciente entra girado. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea blanco.
{T}: Agrega {W} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Ici, les fleurs sauvages s'épanouissent non pas au gré des saisons mais au gré des flux de magie.
foreignData.name: Prairie prospère
foreignData.text:
La Prairie prospère arrive engagée. Au moment où elle arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le blanc.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: I fiori selvatici qui non sbocciano in base alle stagioni, ma seguendo il fluire della magia.
foreignData.name: Brughiera Florida
foreignData.text:
La Brughiera Florida entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal bianco.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 季節ではなく魔法の干満に従って野生の花が咲く。
foreignData.name: 興隆する荒野
foreignData.text:
興隆する荒野はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、白でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{W}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Heath enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
